content: AF-D FT PL SP Flap disc Premium plastic-backed flat flap discs with thread for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to deliver the best balance of higher removal rate, longer lifespan and lower weight Flap discs are more comfortable to grind with – due to lower vibration, longer lifespan and fewer deep marks Threaded backing plate – for nut-free, faster replacement Trimmable flap disc – extends the lifespan and reach Flat shape – smaller abrasive contact area Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing or blending welds on stainless steel, steel and other metals Chamfering edges for weld preparation on stainless steel, steel and other metals Removing burrs from rough cuts on stainless steel, steel and other metals Cleaning rust or paint on stainless steel, steel and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Backing: Plastic with thread Blade / disc shape: Flat - Type 27 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Backing | Plastic with thread | Blade / disc shape | Flat - Type 27 | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel ### ITEMS- 2243370 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P36-40 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2243314 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P60 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2243364 - Flap disc AF-D 4.5 H P80 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2243273 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P36-40 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2243258 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P60 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc - 2243264 - Flap disc AF-D 5 H P80 FT SP - Package Size 10 pc
